Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26952110] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus AB94004 (MIC=6.25μg/mL), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC6538 (MIC=6.25μg/mL), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (MIC=12.5μg/mL), Staphylococcus aureus MRSA P1381 (MIC=6.25μg/mL), Staphylococcus aureus MRSA P1374 (MIC=6.25μg/mL);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli AB94012 (MIC=25μg/mL), Escherichia coli ATCC25922 (MIC=100μg/mL), Pseudomonas aeruginosa AB93066 (MIC=50μg/mL), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC9027 (MIC=25μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.26952110] 2% hemolysis at 50μg/mL, 20% hemolysis at 100μg/mL, 45% hemolysis at 200μg/mL, 65% hemolysis at 400μg/mL against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria
